name: multi-purpose-agent
description: Multi Purpose Agent: Automated Antigravity workflow.

auto-accept.schedule.enabled.description: Enable scheduled prompts to keep the agent active.

auto-accept.schedule.mode.description: Mode for scheduled prompts: 'interval' (every X minutes), 'daily' (at specific time), or 'queue' (sequential execution).

auto-accept.schedule.value.description: Value for schedule: Minutes for 'interval' mode (e.g. '30') or HH:MM for 'daily' mode (e.g. '17:00').

auto-accept.schedule.prompt.description: The prompt text to send periodically (interval/daily modes).

auto-accept.schedule.prompts.description: Queue of prompts to execute sequentially (queue mode).

auto-accept.schedule.queueMode.description: Queue behavior: 'consume' removes prompts after use, 'loop' cycles through them.

auto-accept.schedule.silenceTimeout.description: Seconds of no activity before considering a task complete and advancing the queue.

auto-accept.schedule.checkPrompt.enabled.description: Enable intermediate check prompts between scheduled tasks.

auto-accept.schedule.checkPrompt.text.default: Make sure that the previous task was implemented fully as per requirements, implement all gaps, fix all bugs and test everything. Make sure that you reused existing code where possible instead of duplicating code. ultrathink internally avoiding verbosity.
auto-accept.schedule.checkPrompt.text.description: The check prompt text to send after each task.

auto-accept.antigravityQuota.enabled.description: Show Antigravity quota status in the status bar. Displays remaining model quotas and credits.

auto-accept.antigravityQuota.pollInterva.description: How often to refresh quota information (in seconds).

auto-accept.antigravityQuota.resume.enab.description: Automatically resume the prompt queue when quota becomes available.

auto-accept.autoContinue.enabled.description: Automatically send 'Continue' to the chat when quota refreshes or job is paused.

auto-accept.cdpPort.description: The Chrome DevTools Protocol port used for browser automation. Must match the --remote-debugging-port flag used when launching Antigravity.

auto-accept.debugMode.enabled.description: Enable debug mode for AI agent programmatic control of all extension features via the debugCommand.
